event.title: was absorbed into the Borough of York in the late 1960s

data.event: Weston was incorporated as a village in the 19th century and was absorbed into the Borough of York in the late 1960s.
York itself was amalgamated into Toronto in 1998.

event.title: are lined with tall mature trees, some well over 100 years

data.event: Most streets in Weston are lined with tall mature trees, some well over 100 years old.

event.title: April 26, 2013, a fire was accidentally started

data.event: On April 26, 2013, a fire was accidentally started at 2304 Weston Road, due to tar during roof construction.
